response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value and significance to me. This unique item is not just a commodity; it represents years of dedication, craftsmanship, and innovation. I believe its true worth exceeds expectations, and I am eager to share this experience with someone who appreciates its true value.

To extend this opportunity to you, I am offering the product at a special introductory price of $950,000. This is a significant discount compared to its market value, reflecting my desire to find the right person who will cherish and utilize it to its fullest potential.

Please consider this offer carefully. Should you have any questions or require further information about the product, please do not hesitate to reach out. I am more than happy to provide additional details or arrange a viewing so you can fully appreciate its qualities.

Looking forward to your response and potentially sharing this remarkable product with you.

Warm regards,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
